mapper.insert: insert into reservation(mem_id, room_no, date_in, date_out, cash) values (#{mem_id}, #{room_no}, #{date_in}, #{date_out}, #{price})
mapper.select: select mem_id, date_in, date_out, base_person, cash, payment, imgLink from reservation rv join room ro on rv.room_no = ro.room_no where rsv_idx = #{Rsv_idx}
select room_no, type, base_price, base_person, imgLink from room order by room_no asc

select * from room where room_no not in (select distinct ro.room_no from room ro join reservation rv on rv.room_no = ro.room_no where (date_in between #{date_in} and #{date_out}) or (date_out between #{date_in} and #{date_out}))
